summary: Adds a working, buyable Cure Disease spell to Farengar in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a working, buyable Cure Disease spell to Farengar in Whiterun. It is quite expensive, seeing as a Cure Disease potion costs 500 gold. So a spell which can be re-used should be rather expensive.

I\'ll try to make more spell mods - mainly adding spells from Oblivion and Morrowind into Skyrim. Don\'t expect anything super epic from me, though. I\'m a terrible modder. :D

Installation: Simply extract the \"Elderman\'s Cure Disease Spell.esp\" to your Skyrim Data folder (usually C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data).


My house mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8637
author: Elderman357
